alert.note: Alert for Dunn; McKenzie; Mercer; Oliver (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 12:15PM CST until March 12 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST/5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Burke, Divide, Mountrail, and Williams Counties. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 6 PM CST/5 PM MST/ this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...After a brief lull in winds, expect wind speeds to again increase this afternoon.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
